pageContext.claim: “The Dems are getting another beauty to join their group. Bill de Blasio of NYC, considered the worst mayor in the U.S., will supposedly be making an announcement for president today. He is a JOKE, but if you like high taxes & crime, he’s your man. NYC HATES HIM!”
pageContext.analysis: History will tell if de Blasio is remembered as the worst New York mayor. About 42 percent of New York City residents approve of Mayor Bill de Blasio's performance, according to an April Quinnipiac poll. That's about on par with the president's own approval rating. But that's not the lowest approval rating ever, his predecessor, Michael Bloomberg's approval rating, dipped lower according to Marist.
